methods.clear:
Prepare this adapter for re-use, and eliminate references to external resources.

:return: io.deephaven.base.string.cache.ByteArrayCharSequenceAdapterImpl
methods.set:
Set the byte array backing this CharSequenceAdapter.

:param byteArray: (byte[]) - A byte[] instance that contains a proto-String this adapter knows how to convert.
:param offset: (int) - The index of the first char in byteArray that belongs to the proto-String.
:param length: (int) - The length of the proto-String in chars.
:return: (io.deephaven.base.string.cache.ByteArrayCharSequenceAdapterImpl) This CharSequenceAdapter.
methods.toCompressedString:
Convert this StringCompatible into a CompressedString. Implementations should not cache result CompressedStrings,
 in order to avoid inadvertently allowing promotion of short-lived objects under generational garbage collection.

:return: (io.deephaven.base.string.cache.CompressedString) A newly constructed CompressedString representing the same sequence of characters as this
         StringCompatible (or this object, if appropriate).
methods.toMappedCompressedString:
Convert this StringCompatible into a MappedCompressedString. Implementations should not cache result
 CompressedStrings, in order to avoid inadvertently allowing promotion of short-lived objects under generational
 garbage collection.

:return: (io.deephaven.base.string.cache.MappedCompressedString) A newly constructed MappedCompressedString representing the same sequence of characters as this
         StringCompatible (or this object, if appropriate).

text: See documentation in the interface and parent class for details.
